Game.Name: Dogz
Game.Plot: In Dogz®, you adopt an adorable puppy from different breeds, raise and train him just like in real life. • Adopt a cute puppy, take care of him, bond with him, and make him happy. • Choose your favorite from 18 breeds of adorable puppies! • Teach your clever pooch all kinds of tricks such as sit and shake. He'll do anything to make you happy. • Dress up your puppy in all kinds of adorable outfits • Take up to 5 pictures of your puppy each day and write a diary that you can exchange with friends online.
